name:
SEx Co.
Branch
desc: A public sales branch of the Stinger Explosives Corporation where legally grey arms, officially just mining equipment, are sold. The corporation's 'no questions asked' policy makes it a favorite among underworld figures.

name:
Company
Exchange
desc: A private market where commissioned members of SEx Co. can purchase mercenary-spec ships and other military equipment at a discount.

name:
Sindrian
Vanguard
desc:
Trade with $theFaction elite hardware base.

Elite hardware modified for operations in the Askonia system under orders from Supreme Executor Philip Andrada can be bought here, provided you have the necessary credentials.

name:
Mbaye-Gogol
Surplus
desc:
Trade with the local MGA civilian surplus market.

The Mbaye-Gogol Autofab Corporation maintains a monopoly over the sale and maintenance of cheap, mass-produced ships for civilian use. Being the pre-Collapse designers of various civilian designs like the MGA-430 Nebula and the MGA-220 Pegasus (Known as the "Mudskipper" between spacers), Mbaye-Gogol is a respected and trusted name in the industry.

name:
XIV
Surplus
desc:
Trade with $theFaction elite hardware base.

Old surplus hardware from the Second AI War is sold to enlisted commanders of the Hegemony Navy here. Sales are tightly restricted and monitored.

name:
Rosalina
Prototypes
desc:
A private prototype hardware market managed by Rosalina.

Rosalina-spec prototype ships can be found here.
